text:
と…ところで
君の名は
何だっけ…?
style: font-size: 14px;color: #950C21;background-color: #FF7593;left: 13px;top: 27px;width: 107px;height: 54px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 13px;color: #965A12;background-color: #F8EE62;left: 150px;top: 50px;width: 57px;height: 41px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
今朝は
聞き取れ
なくてさ…
style: font-size: 14px;color: #950C21;background-color: #FF7593;left: 33px;top: 90px;width: 112px;height: 57px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
その友達とは
初対面かな…
style: font-size: 14px;color: #950C21;background-color: #FF7593;left: 179px;top: 92px;width: 98px;height: 77px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #950C21;background-color: #FF7593;left: 448px;top: 146px;width: 53px;height: 77px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
あ!そうね!
パーシー
こちらはマリナ。
マリナ、この人は
パーシー!
style: font-size: 13px;color: #965A12;background-color: #F8EE62;left: 483px;top: 30px;width: 115px;height: 95px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
